alert.note: Alert for Delano-Wasco-Shafter; Southeast San Joaquin Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 6:28PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Kern and southern Tulare Counties through 700 PM PST... At 627 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Delano, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Delano, McFarland and Richgrove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
